At Kapture®, our KĀR warranty is designed with you in mind.
KĀR (pronounced "care") represents our Kustomer Always Right mentality to service. We commit to repair or replace your Kapture product if it becomes damaged or defective. All we ask is that you pay the return shipping. Should we be unable to repair your item, we'll replace it with an equal or superior model.

Regardless of how the damage happened, who is responsible, or where you bought the product, we're here to assist you. Our KĀR Warranty includes coverage for all Kapture Phone Cases, Adapters, Magnetic Rings, Mount Rings, Integrated Eye Cups, and other items made by Kapture.

Lifetime Warranty with:
Unlimited Claims
Fully Transferable
No Receipt Required

Please be aware: This warranty does not cover theft, loss, intentional damage, or cosmetic concerns that do not affect the product's performance.

Is your Kapture part not working or damaged? Lets get you taken care of!

Give us a call at (435) 677-1774 if you would like to speak to a live technician.
You can also reach drop us a note here.

There is no need to contact us to initiate a return or warranty claim. Simply start by clicking the button below and we will get you taken care of.
